service.name: Full Set Classic
service.description: Single lash extensions are applied to individual natural lashes along the upper eyelid. The number depends on the look you want and how many natural lashes you have.

service.name: Classic Infills
service.description: Infills are recommended within 2-3 weeks of your last treatment. You will need at least 50% ofmyour treatment left or it will be charged as a full set.

service.name: Lash Removal
service.description: Lash extensions must be professionally removed with a special debonder. This gently removes them and all traces of the adhesive from the natural lash without damaging them.

service.name: lash lift and tint
service.description: Darken and lift your lashes without using mascara. A patch test is required 48 hours before treatment.
